doc.field: C L f0514reute u f BC-OMAHA-HOGS-SEEN-OFF-0 04-07 0047
OMAHA HOGS SEEN OFF 0.50 DLR - PRIVATE SOURCES

Hog prices was expected 0.50 dlr lower on estimated receipts of 2,700 head, private sources said. Top seen at 50.00 dlrs per cwt. There were reports that the west had an overrun of hogs yesterday. Reuter
